name: EthereumData
0:
”Alexa ask ethereum data for ethereum price”
”Alexa ask ethereum data for gas fee”
”Alexa ask ethereum data for current block”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ethereum data
des:
Get ethereum current price, gas fee price, and current block.

DISCLAIMER: The price is fetched from Binance Rest API, cached every 5 seconds. The gas fee and block are fetched from Etherscan API, cached every 15 seconds. Any delay of data is expected.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
